entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023
